CustomField.formula: ((5 * ( FLOOR( ( EndDateAllocated__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( EndDateAllocated__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( StartDateAllocated__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( StartDateAllocated__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )) * Resource__r.RatePerHour__c
CustomField.label: totalWorkDaysAmount
